name: Pokémon Joel's Bizarre PokeVenture
overview: Story: In it, members of Vinesauce get kidnapped by an unknown person and turned into Pokémon. You play as Joel, and must find his Pokémon friends, collect them all and then get them turned back into humans, and find out who was responsible. Features: •There are no gyms and you cannot catch Pokémon, only the ones given to you by the game. •So it's not exactly a "traditional" Pokémon game. •There is also some adult language and themes.
